title: a new hope theatrical original unaltered.mkv.mkv
description:
this is a rip of the 2004 a new hope bonus disc which contains the original, unaltered version of the film.  
this is only my third torrent torrent so i don't know the specifics, but i used MakeMKV BETA and it should look exactly how it did on my tv, on which it was wide screen,but the black bars on top and bottom were thicker than for, say, a blu ray disc. i want to say the box said it was anamorphic. (im still not familiar with all the terminology yet)


audio is in english dolby 2.0, spanish dolby 2.0 and french dolby 2.0.
subtitles are in english, spanish and french.


PLEASE RATE AUDIO AND VIDEO QUALITY AND SEED!
